section.title: Other Formats
section.para:
In addition to the formats we've already reviewed, QEMU has varrying levels of support for several other disk image formats. See the documentation
QEMU User Docs: 3.6.6 Disk image file formats - for a complete description of their supported options.
The following formats are supported by QEMU in a read-write mode:

listitem.para: Old QEMU image format with support for backing files and compact image files (when your filesystem or transport medium does not support holes).
User Mode Linux Copy On Write image format. It is supported only for compatibility with previous versions.

section.para: The following formats are also supported by QEMU in a read-only mode:

listitem.para:
Linux Compressed Loop image, useful only to reuse directly compressed CD-ROM images present for example in the Knoppix CD-ROMs
KNOPPIX: bootable Live Linux system on CD/DVD - .
